Partner With Us

Why get involved?
Curriculum

Place our delegates to the test on your own terms. You have the chance to shape your competition rounds according to your needs! Our Curriculum Team will ensure that our rounds are exactly what you are looking for.
Marketing

Get your brand recognized within the undergraduate community by showing that you are invested in their development and creating those relationships early!
Recruitment

Get ready to meet some of the brightest students across Canada! Enter the undergraduate network to capitalize on fresh ideas and sted talents.
